title: ACs, magistrates conduct raids against professional beggars
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP):On the directives of Deputy Commissioner (DC) Islamabad Irfan Nawaz Memon, the Assistant Commissioners and Magistrates conducted raids against professional beggars in various areas of the federal capital.
According to the ICT spokesperson, Assistant Commissioner Rural arrested seven beggars from police station Lohi Bhair and surrounding areas.
Later, arrested professional beggars transferred to the police station while the rest of the minors were sent to the Edhi Center.
It should be noted that operations against beggars under the supervision of Assistant Commissioners were underway on daily basis.
